page.title: 05THE FUN RUN AT WESTON
page.content: THE RUNS WERE HELD ON 23RD JUNE 1985. 160 PEOPLE RAN TWO MILES AND 140 RAN 5 MILES.THE WINNER OF THE 2 MILES WAS ADAM WEEKS IN 11 MINUTES 26 SECONDS AND THE WINNER OF THE 5 MILES JEFF ELEY IN 27 MINUTES 56 SECONDS. THE RUNS WERE ORGANISED BY TWO TEENAGE BOYS FROM OUR VILLAGE IN ORDER TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE ETHIOPIAN FAMINE RELIEF.Â£250 WAS RAISED.ALL THOSE WHO RAN GOT FREE DRINK AND A MEDAL.SOME PEOPLE RAN IN FANCY DRESS.THERE WAS A MAN IN A STRIPED NIGHT SHIRT AND NIGHT CAP.AISO THERE WAS A BOY DRESSED AS A FAIRY WITH A FRILLY SKIRT AND BIG UGLY BOOTS.THERE WAS A RAFFLE FOR SMALL PRIZES LIKE FRUIT ,GROCERIES AND SOAP. ALL IN ALL IT WAS A GREAT DAY IN OUR VILLAGE.SOME OF OUR CHILDREN HELPED WITH THE STALLS AND THE HEADTEACHER GAVE ASSISTANCE WHEN THE BOYS CALLED.
